pkgmetadata.longdescription: Panel Data Analysis with Heterogeneous Dynamics // Understanding the dynamics of potentially heterogeneous variables is important in statistical applications. This package provides tools for estimating the degree of heterogeneity across cross- sectional units in the panel data analysis. The methods are developed by Okui and Yanagi (2019) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2019.04.036 and Okui and Yanagi (2020) doi:10.1093/ectj/utz019.
